name: Plant App Freebies
description:
Hi all, i want to share my plant app design to you all, here is the feature:


Identify feature

Provides a feature where users can identify unknown plants using only their smart phone cameras

Species Feature

Presents a feature where the user can get to know more about the plants he likes by studying a variety of plant species

Articles feature

Provides a variety of free articles about plants and also many articles about gardening that will broaden the kit's insight
